price: Kuma dã waɗanda suka yi zãlunci sunã da abin da ke cikin ƙasã gaba ɗaya, da misãlinsa a tãre da shi lalle dã sun yi fansa da shi daga mummunar azãba, a Rãnar ¡iyãma. Kuma abin da ba su kasance sunã zato ba, daga Allah, ya bayyana a gare su.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا وَمِثۡلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفۡتَدَوۡاْ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَحۡتَسِبُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw anna lilladhīna ẓalamū mā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan wamith'lahu maʿahu la-if'tadaw bihi min sūi al-ʿadhābi yawma al-qiyāmati wabadā lahum mina al-lahi mā lam yakūnū yaḥtasibūna
